course.subject: SCIE
course.name: Enrichment Project
course.description: For Science students only.  This course aims to provide complementary educational experience to students outside normal academic curriculum through engagements in internship or outside-classroom project activities related to his/her own discipline.  Students enrolled would work under the supervision of a faculty member and are required to submit a report by the end of the semester, in addition to other criteria set by his/her supervisor.  Course coordinator's approval is required for taking the course.  1 credit is normally assigned for 40 hours of work. Graded P or F. Maybe graded PP.
